entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
